title: Cane Creek 40-Series Integrated Headset for Tapered Forks

description: Item Description Item Description The 40-Series is the workhorse of Cane Creeks headset line-up. Representing the balance of performance, durability and value, the series incorporates all the features necessary for a robust, lightweight, long-lasting headset. Integrated bearings fit directly into compatible head tubes without the need of a bearing press.Sealed black oxide bearingsInterlok spacer compatibleUses 36/45 degree crown race and compression ringCarbon-friendy compression ring captured in top cover, keeping shims in placeSteel crown race with integrated sealsCompatible with tapered 1-1/8 to 1-1/2 steerer tubes, or straight 1-1/8 steerers with a conversion crown race (sold separately)Item SpecificationsColorBlackCrown Race40Bearing TypeCartridgeDefined ColorBlackS.H.I.S UpperIS42S.H.I.S LowerIS52S.H.I.S.
